name: Warbit Union
description:
Warbit Union History
Warbit Union is a very old project. It is a trial project I made in 2015 to improve myself. I found it in my archive and wanted to share it with you. I do not think to develop the project, I do not think it is a project to be developed anyway, but if you want the game to progress and develop, I will be listening to you in the comments.

NOTE: Features shown in the project may not be working. As I mentioned in the "History" section, it is only a trial project and it is likely to have many problems.

(The project was developed with the Unity game engine. It was built from Unity 5.6.2.)

Gameplay and Features
WASD - Walking Keys
Mouse Sol - Fire
Right Mouse - Aim

Q - Weapon Customization (Can be used in the game, but not included in the terrorist team, i.e. team 2)

CTRL - Lie on the ground
C - Crouch

Key 1 - Choose a weapon (Forward)
Key 2 - Choose a weapon (Back)
